attributes.action: Put an immediate stop to the introduction of puberty blockers to children.
attributes.additional_details:
Its an absolute disgrace that this government will allow the experimentation of puberty blockers on children as young as 8 years old. Children of this age have no real preconception of what puberty blockers will do and that it is irreversible.
Leave the children alone, don’t allow parents or the government to experiment on children, allow them to enjoy their young lives until such time they can make an informed decision in later life.
The government, in my opinion will face future legal battles.
attributes.background: Wes Streeting needs to reverse his decision to allow experimenting on children.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Cancel the clinical trial into puberty blockers & safeguard vulnerable children
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751839
